comment: A man in an pilot uniform is walking down the sidewalk carrying luggage .
A pilot has walked off of an airplane , with his hat and suitcase in hand .
A grim looking man with sunglasses pilots a boat .
A man pilots a kayak through rough rapids .
A pilot is standing in the cockpit doorway with a smile on his face as he looks at the entrance door .
The pilot looking out of a British Airways airplane while two men are standing outside .
Two pilots walk along carrying a young girl with a bandaged head .
A man piloting a boat with goods in the back .
A pilot is bending down to assist a man that is crying .
A pilot dressed in a dark-colored sweater is sitting in the cock-pit of a plane with his hands crossed .
Two boys pilot a rowboat on a lazy river .
A man piloting behind the wheel of a boat .
Small plane with spinning propeller on ground , pilot seen through windows .
An uniformed man leaned out of a side pilot 's window of a large American Airline aircraft to wash the cockpit 's window .
A pilot wearing his professional uniform stands next to his luggage with a newspaper in an airport terminal .
In the cockpit , a pilot wearing a bright yellow vest presses buttons on the over-head control panel .
The image is of a pilot wearing a white shirt at the controls of an airplane .

A man with a grayish blue shirt , red and blue vest , black pants , sunglasses , and earphones is standing beside a red helicopter , while the door is open revealing the inside of the helicopter , with it 's pilot and other earphones hanging in the background .
A pilot leans out the open window the cockpit to clean the window of his plane .
A man wearing a pilot uniform is bending over towards a suitcase outside of a set of steps leading into a plane .
Two pilots are in the cockpit of an aircraft navigating over land and water .
Man in camouflage uniform with orange life vest , piloting a boat .
Two pilots are standing and talking in front of a British Airways airplane .
A man wearing a safety helmet and a red and black life vest is piloting his yellow Wave Sport kayak in rough waters .
An air force pilot is holding his daughter in his arms on a runway .
A pilot wearing a light blue shirt , dark pants and tie is standing in front of a plane , smiling .
A man in shorts and a Hawaiian shirt leans over the rail of a pilot boat , with fog and mountains in the background .
